Blurry Placeholders!

I've used my Grunt task grunt-jimp to generate tiny (in file size) placeholder images, and prevent content jumping whilst I wait for Layzr.js to lazy load my hi-res sources. I would suggest throttling your machine's connection (via Chrome Devtools) to see the effect best. If you want to know more about this project, have a look at what I wrote for Medium.
